annotation.spannedText: The a priori assumption that the non-vaccinated are carriers and transmitters of a disease the vaccinated are immune to has not been scientifically validated

classMention.mentionClass: The a priori assumption that the non-vaccinated are carriers and transmitters of a disease the vaccinated are immune to has not been scientifically validated

annotation.spannedText: This double failure of the MMR vaccine renders highly suspicious the unsubstantiated claims that when an outbreak of measles occurs the non- or minimally vaccinated are responsible

classMention.mentionClass: This double failure of the MMR vaccine renders highly suspicious the unsubstantiated claims that when an outbreak of measles occurs the non- or minimally vaccinated are responsible

annotation.spannedText: The assumption that vaccination equals bona fide immunity has never been supported by the evidence itself

classMention.mentionClass: The assumption that vaccination equals bona fide immunity has never been supported by the evidence itself

annotation.spannedText: even when a vaccine is mandated, and 99% of a population receive the measles vaccines, outbreaks not only happen, but as compliance increases vaccine resistance sporadic outbreaks also increase -- a clear indication of vaccine failure

classMention.mentionClass: even when a vaccine is mandated, and 99% of a population receive the measles vaccines, outbreaks not only happen, but as compliance increases vaccine resistance sporadic outbreaks also increase -- a clear indication of vaccine failure

annotation.spannedText: the MMR can cause measles inclusion body encephalitis (MIBE)

classMention.mentionClass: the MMR can cause measles inclusion body encephalitis (MIBE)
